020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer;
021
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024
025import javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType;
026import java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType;
027import java.lang.reflect.Type;
028import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
029import java.util.List;
030
031import org.apiguardian.api.API;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ArrayTypeNameImpl;
034
035/**
036 *  The specialisation of
037 *  {@link TypeName}
038 *  for array types.
039 *
040 *  @author Square,Inc.
041 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
042 *  @version $Id: ArrayTypeName.java 1067 2023-09-28 21:09:15Z tquadrat $
043 *  @since 0.0.5
044 *
045 *  @UMLGraph.link
046 */
047@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ArrayTypeName.java 1067 2023-09-28 21:09:15Z tquadrat $" )
048@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
049public sealed interface ArrayTypeName extends TypeName
050    permits ArrayTypeNameImpl
051{
052        /*---------*\
053    ====** Methods **==========================================================
054        \*---------*/
055    /**
056     *  {@inheritDoc}
057     */
058    @Override
059    public ArrayTypeName annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations );
060
061    /**
062     *  Returns this array's component type.
063     *
064     *  @return The component type.
065     */
066    public TypeName componentType();
067
068    /**
069     *  Returns an instance of {@code ArrayTypeName} for an array type that is
070     *  equivalent to {@code mirror}.
071     *
072     *  @param  mirror  The mirror for the array.
073     *  @return The new instance of {@code ArrayTypeName}.
074     */
075    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
076    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
077    public static ArrayTypeName from( final ArrayType mirror )
078    {
079        final var retValue = ArrayTypeNameImpl.from( mirror, new LinkedHashMap<>() );
080
081        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
082        return retValue;
083    }   //  from()
084
085    /**
086     *  Returns an instance of {@code ArrayTypeName} for an array type that is
087     *  equivalent to {@code type}.
088     *
089     *  @param  type    The array type.
090     *  @return The new instance of {@code ArrayTypeName}.
091     */
092    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
093    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
094    public static ArrayTypeName from( final GenericArrayType type )
095    {
096        final var retValue = ArrayTypeNameImpl.from( type, new LinkedHashMap<>() );
097
098        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
099        return retValue;
100    }   //  from()
101
102    /**
103     *  Returns an instance of {@code ArrayTypeName} for an array type that is
104     *  equivalent to {@code mirror}.
105     *
106     *  @param  mirror  The mirror for the array.
107     *  @return The new instance of {@code ArrayTypeName}.
108     *
109     *  @deprecated Use
110     *      {@link #from(ArrayType)}
111     *      instead.
112     */
113    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
114    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
115    public static ArrayTypeName get( final ArrayType mirror ) { return from( mirror ); }
116
117    /**
118     *  Returns an instance of {@code ArrayTypeName} for an array type that is
119     *  equivalent to {@code type}.
120     *
121     *  @param  type    The array type.
122     *  @return The new instance of {@code ArrayTypeName}.
123     *
124     *  @deprecated Use
125     *      {@link #from(GenericArrayType)}
126     *      instead.
127     */
128    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
129    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
130    public static ArrayTypeName get( final GenericArrayType type ) { return from( type ); }
131
132    /**
133     *  Returns an array type whose elements are all instances of the given
134     *  component type.
135     *
136     *  @param  componentType   The component type.
137     *  @return The new instance of {@code ArrayTypeName}.
138     */
139    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
140    public static ArrayTypeName of( final TypeName componentType )
141    {
142        return ArrayTypeNameImpl.of( componentType );
143    }   //  of()
144
145    /**
146     *  Returns an array type whose elements are all instances of the given
147     *  component type.
148     *
149     *  @param  componentType   The component type.
150     *  @return The new instance of {@code ArrayTypeName}.
151     */
152    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
153    public static ArrayTypeName of( final Type componentType )
154    {
155        return ArrayTypeNameImpl.of( componentType );
156    }   //  of()
157
158    /**
159     *  {@inheritDoc}
160     */
161    @Override
162    public TypeName withoutAnnotations();
163}
164//  interface ArrayTypeName
165
166/*
167 *  End of File
168 */
